containsVar

public int containsVar(int varname)
Returns -1 if this object contains the specified variable.

Specified by:
containsVar in interface VarHolder
Parameters:
varname - the variable number to check. It should be the last variable of a variable-chain.
Returns:
-1 if this object contains the specified variable. Otherwise, returns the number of symbols in the object.
